branchCategory.name: Rod
branchCategory.description: The AC servo version of the LEY rod features an AC servo motor instead of a DC version. The AC servo motor enables higher speed, acceleration, and pushing force, as well as a size 63 model not available in a DC version. The drivers are pulse input type, with both incremental and absolute encoder options and 17- or 18-bit resolution.

branchItem.name: LEY, Electric Actuator, Rod Type, AC Servo Motor (100/200W)
branchItem.description: The AC servo version of the LEY rod features an AC servo motor instead of a DC version. The AC servo motor enables higher speed, acceleration, and pushing force, as well as a size 63 model not available in a DC version. The drivers are pulse input type, with both incremental and absolute encoder options and 17- or 18-bit resolution.
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Body sizes: 25, 32 <LI>Maximum work load: 60 kg (horizontal); 46 kg (vertical) <LI>Maximum pushing force: 736 N <LI>Maximum stroke: 500 mm <LI>Positioning repeatability: ±0.02 mm <LI>Motor available with either incremental 17-bit or absolute 18-bit encoder </LI></UL>

branchItem.name: LEY63, Electric Actuator, Rod Type
branchItem.description: The AC servo version of the LEY rod features an AC servo motor instead of a DC version. The AC servo motor enables higher speed, acceleration, and pushing force, as well as a size 63 model not available in a DC version. The drivers are pulse input type, with both incremental and absolute encoder options and 17- or 18-bit resolution.
branchItem.bullets:
<UL> <LI>IP5x or IP65 ( option “P” ) <LI>Maximum work load: 80 kg (horizontal); 72 kg (vertical) <LI>Maximum pushing force: 1910 N <LI>Maximum stroke: 800 mm <LI>Positioning repeatability: ±0.02 mm <LI>Motor available with either incremental 17-bit or absolute 18-bit encoder
</LI></UL>

branchItem.name: LEY, Electric Actuator, Rod Type, Motorless
branchItem.description: The LEY is available in a motorless type, permitting the mounting of an AC servo motor other than the standard chosen by SMC.  Shaft coupling and mounting patterns are compatible with 8 servo motor series from 5 manufacturers.  Manufacturers include Mitsubishi, Yaskawa, Sanyo Denki, Omron, and Panasonic.

branchItem.name: 25A-LEY Electric Actuator, Rod Type, AC Servo Motor, Secondary Battery
branchItem.description: The 25A- series variations are compatible with secondary battery manufacturing for electronics, automotive, and other vehicle types. Design goals include eliminating copper (Cu) and zinc (Zn) materials where possible, and employing a low dew point grease that retains lubricity even in low manufacturing termpertures. Please note the copper and zinc materials are used for the motors, cables, controllers and drivers.
branchItem.bullets: <UL><LI>Same features and performance as standard LEY <LI>Stainless steel bolts for construction <LI>Low dew point grease functional down to -70°C <LI>Copper and zinc free except for motor, cables, and controller <LI>Alloy steel rod bearing, replaces bronze bearing <LI>Non-standard materials for compatibility with secondary/rechargeable battery manufacturing</LI></UL>
